notes: BK Back to Life emulator; Qt version (bkbtl-qt) for cross-platform; uses WAV files for tape save/load; AppImage available for Linux
SDL-based emulator; also supports Terak 8510/a; requires building from source
BK-0010 has Good status; BK-0011M has Preliminary status; requires BIOS ROMs
Libretro port; no native saves; supports save states and rewind; requires BIOS ROMs in system/bk folder
